cam0_front.notes: Logitech BRIO 4K at 1080p, zoom=100 confirmed via v4l2 ioctl. 90° diagonal FOV → f=1101.5px. Distortion estimated (BRIO typical barrel).

cam1_overhead.notes: Logitech BRIO 4K at 1080p, zoom=100 confirmed via v4l2 ioctl. 90° diagonal FOV → f=1101.5px. Distortion estimated (BRIO typical barrel).

notes: Both BRIOs at zoom=100 (widest). f = (sqrt(1920²+1080²)/2) / tan(45°) = 1101.5px. Distortion coefficients still estimated — checkerboard calibration would refine k1/k2.
